name: Sneak To The Rhythm
description:
This puzzle rhythm stealth game is one of kind!

Use boomboxes and good timing to guide a musical ninja through nine levels of music and fun.

This game features groovy dance moves, 3 original musical tracks, and a desperate Colonel...

Ludum Dare Page Link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/sneak-to-the-rhythm
